name: ElasticMapReduceClusterApplication
description: Application is a property of the AWS::EMR::Cluster resource that adds an Amazon Elastic MapReduce (Amazon EMR) application bundle or third-party software to an Amazon EMR cluster.

properties.name: AdditionalInfo
properties.desc: Metadata about third-party applications that third-party vendors use for testing purposes.

properties.name: Args
properties.desc: Arguments that Amazon EMR passes to the application.

properties.name: Name
properties.desc: The name of the application to add to your cluster, such as Hadoop or Hive. For valid values, see the Applications parameter in the Amazon Elastic MapReduce API Reference.
